title: 13-yr-old boy killed in leopard attack in Pune village; mob sets forest dept office, vehicle on fire
description: Fifth death in incidents of human-leopard conflict in Pune district this year, victims children or elderly.
content: A 13-YEAR-OLD boy was killed in a leopard attack in Shirur taluka on Sunday afternoon the fifth such death in Pune district this year. After the incident, villagers set on fire a forest department veâ€¦ [+2727 chars]
